articles.title: U.S., G7 allies may strip Russia of 'most favored nation' status - Reuters.com
articles.description: The United States, together with the Group of Seven nations and the European Union, will move on Friday to revoke Russia's "most favored nation" status over its invasion of Ukraine, multiple people familiar with the situation told Reuters.
articles.content: WASHINGTON, March 10 (Reuters) - The United States, together with the Group of Seven nations and the European Union, will move on Friday to revoke Russia's "most favored nation" status over its invas… [+3028 chars]

articles.title: European Central Bank to end quantitative easing, then interest rates will rise - The Times
articles.description: The European Central Bank has signalled an end to its crisis-era bond buying later this year in a bid to stave off record inflation despite the war in Ukraine hitting economic growth.Christine Lagarde, European Central Bank president, said the eurozone’s €3.3…
